General

By default, you are not limited on how many times you can save your work duration into storage during the day. If you want to be restricted to only able to save once per day, change value below to 'once per day'.

Set your weekly work hours below. If it is set to more than zero, you will see how much your remaining work hours every week.

hours
Storage

You can save up to 14 data to local storage. By default, everytime your data hit more than 14, it is automatically clear your oldest data, then save the newly data to storage. You can also clear your storage by click button below.
